item.title: Paul McCartney & Stevie Wonder - Ebony And Ivory
item.description:
Ebony and Ivory
live together
In perfect harmony
side by side
On my piano keyboard
oh Lord why don’t we
We all know that
people are the same
Where ever you go
there is good and bad
In everyone
we learn to live
We learn to give
each other
What we need to
survive together alive

live together
In perfect harmony
side by side
On my piano keyboard
oh Lord why don’t we-

perfect harmony
